item.title: SoDAA Website Visual Design
item.dc:creator: Aaron Yang
item.description: Official website design for NDSU the School of Design, Architecture, and Art.
item.content:encoded:
Print this Page

MY ROLE:

  • Visual Design
  • Website Design

TIME:

Jan. 2019 – Dec. 2019

Introduction

This project is the redesign of the websites of the School of Design, Architecture, and Art and its three departments when the school was migrating the websites to a new CMS template. I created the visual design language for the new websites.

Old

New

Exploration of the patterns

Try more random patterns.

Typography

Website Banners

Design for Social Media

Home Page Design

Visit the live website

https://www.ndsu.edu/sodaa/

Other Featured Projects

ADL 1-2-3 Device

A gamified system that saves young patients’ lives by finishing daily hygiene activities.

Simple Booking

A space-scheduling system that helped students reserve a space in facilities during the pandemic.

SoDAA Alumni Map

An interactive map that shows the alumni network of NDSU SoDAA.

item.title: Interaction Lab
item.dc:creator: Aaron Yang
item.description: Personal experiments and practices on webpage interaction and animation.
item.content:encoded:
Interactive Media

The following projects were my experiments and practices on interactive media. Please click on the images to try them in a new tab.

AI created webpage

Read the Story

Other Coding Projects

Easy Firebase-RTDB

This is a helper class that helps front-end developers easily connect to Firebase Realtime Database with minimum JavaScript code, without worry about backend programming.

View Code

JDom

This library helps front-end developers use JSON-structured data to create DOM elements, providing an easy way to create dynamic HTML content with JavaScript.

View Code

GPTassist

GPTassit is a chatbot using GPT 3.5 model.

Try it

For more coding projects, please visit https://github.com/hua3467.
